creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: two outer bands of predominately brown with thin and patterned stripes in rust, white and yellow, and pairs of stitched red rectangles; central band has woven diamond and key designs in turquoise, rust, yellow and green; central embroidered (?) geometric designs in similar colors including white; short ends trimmed in blue and white floral printed fabric
title: Skirt
